title: Halloween Heat V Menage
description: Erotic Contemporary MénageFive scorching contemporary erotic tales of ménage love to heat even the coldest Halloween night.“Thrills and Chills” by Alyssa Turner“Deployment Gifts” by Jennifer James“Phantom Pleasure” by Eden Summers“Taking Candy” by Vristen Pierce“Trick or Treat” by Ana Maria Pasión
author: Alyssa Turner
